rate if you rent at an offairport location and exit on our shuttle bus Weekly rates require a day minimum rental or daily rates apply For weekend rates the vehicle must be picked up after am on Thursday and returned before midnight on Monday or higher daily rates apply hour advance reservation required May not be combined with other discounts Availability is limited All vehicles must be returned to the country of origin Offer not valid in San Jose CA NATIONAL CAR RENTAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS Customer must provide Contract ID at the time of reservation to be eligible for discounts
